meta.dc:title: 117 HR 208 ENR: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 500 West Main Street, Suite 102 in Tupelo, Mississippi, as the “Colonel Carlyle ‘Smitty’ Harris Post Office”.
meta.dc:creator: United States House of Representatives
meta.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

preface.congress: One Hundred Seventeenth Congress of the United States of America
preface.enrolledDateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Sunday, the third day of January, two thousand and twenty-one

longTitle.officialTitle: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 500 West Main Street, Suite 102 in Tupelo, Mississippi, as the “Colonel Carlyle ‘Smitty’ Harris Post Office”.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representa­tives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

subsection.heading: Designation.—
subsection.content: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 500 West Main Street, Suite 102 in Tupelo, Mississippi, shall be known and designated as the “Colonel Carlyle ‘Smitty’ Harris Post Office”.

subsection.heading: References.—
subsection.content: Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the “Colonel Carlyle ‘Smitty’ Harris Post Office”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
